cgb_bulk_modulus.py¶

Calculates the bulk modulus (in GPa) for a given potential, host species, and crystal lattice by fitting a quadratic curve to the energy-volume data. A single substitutional solute can be added to the cell if the potential will allow it. In this case, it is advisable to increase the cell repetitions and look at the change in bulk modulus, volume, etc. as a function of supercell size (i.e. solute concentration).

usage: cgb_bulk_modulus [-h] (--fcc FCC | --bcc BCC) [--solute SOLUTE]
                        [--repetitions REPETITIONS]
                        [--repetition_samples REPETITION_SAMPLES]
                        [--strain STRAIN] [--nsamples NSAMPLES]
                        [--lammps_force_convergence LAMMPS_FORCE_CONVERGENCE]
                        [--lammps_max_steps LAMMPS_MAX_STEPS] [--procs PROCS]
                        potential host

Positional Arguments¶

potential Path to the empirical potential to use.
host Elemental symbol for the host.

Named Arguments¶

–fcc, -fcc Use fcc lattice with the given initial guess for lattice constant (in angstroms).
–bcc, -bcc Use bcc lattice with the given initial guess for lattice constant (in angstroms).
–solute, -sol Elemental symbol for a solute.
–repetitions, -reps
 

Maximum number of unit cell repetitions to use for cell.

Default: 1

–repetition_samples, -rep_samples
 

Number of logarithmically sampled cell repetitions to use between 1 and repetitions.

Default: 1

–strain, -stn

Maximum strain magnitude for generating energy-volume curve.

Default: 1e-05

–nsamples, -n

Number of points in energy-volume curve.

Default: 8

–lammps_force_convergence, -ftol
 

Force convergence for all LAMMPS minimizations in eV/angstrom. (Minimizations are used to find a good guess for the ideal volume before applying strains and using static calculations to generate an energy-volume curve.)

Default: 0.001

–lammps_max_steps, -lms
 

Max steps for LAMMPS energy minimization.

Default: 10000

–procs, -np

Max processors available to run mpi on.

Default: 1
